thread.title: PPP leader Mustafa Khar decides to join PTI
thread.title_full: PPP leader Mustafa Khar decides to join PTI

title: PPP leader Mustafa Khar decides to join PTI
text:
PPP leader Mustafa Khar decides to join PTI | 0 0 
LAHORE: A prominent politician of Pakistan Peoples Party, Ghulam Mustafa Khar, has decided to join Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf, putting an end to his decades long association with the party. 
While talking to Geo News over the phone, Mustafa Khar confirmed his decision, saying he will announce his defection in his meeting with PTI Chairperson Imran Khan. Mustafa Khar, who is also the former governor of Punjab, said he is getting a big platform after a very long time. However, he did not speak about taking the oath of the party. 
But he has spoken to PTI Secretary General Jehangir Tareen and another party leader, Ishaq Khakwani, the former governor said. 
He joined PPP in 1960s as a close friend and political ally. 
Mustafa Khar was married to an author and activist, Tehmina Durrani, who is now the wife of Punjab Chief Minister Shahbaz Sharif. 
In her book, My Feudal Lord, Durrani writes about her troubled marriage with Mustafa Khar. 
His son Bilal Khar was accused of throwing acid on his wife Fakhra Younus, who later committed suicide. However, Bilal Khar continued to deny that he bore any responsibility for her death, reported The Telegraph. 0 0 PPP leader Mustafa Khar decides to join PTI was posted in pakistan of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on February 21, 2017 and was last updated on February 21, 2017. This news story is related to Geo News, Latest News, Geo Pakistan, Ppp, Former Governor, Leader, Party, Defection, Pti, Chairperson, Meeting, Tehmina Durrani, Bilal Khar, Fakhira Younus, Accused.
